name: Chronicles of Azeroth
description:
Chronicles of Azeroth team is working on the remake of the first two Warcraft games.



Multiplayer maps for Warcraft 1 and Warcraft 2 are avaiable online by searching for coa or wc1/wc2 in Starcraft 2 custom games.



First beta version of Warcraft 1 campaign is done.
author: rommper
